Description: A federal judge sentenced Chemical and Metal Industries Inc., a company based in Colorado, to two years probation, a $1,000,000 fine, and $2,000,000 in restitution to the victim's estate, including his three children. The sentence stems from C&MIs conviction for negligently causing the release of hazardous air pollutants and thereby negligently placing another person in imminent danger of death, in violation of Title 42, United States Code, Section 7413(c)(4) (federal Clean Air Act).

NAICS Translation: 325188: All Other Basic Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
